kickstart.post:
/sbin/ldconfig
# scratch space for job computation mkdir -p /state/partition1/lm mkdir -p /state/partition1/lm/jobs
chgrp -R lmwriter /state/partition1/lm chmod -R g+ws /state/partition1/lm
# these directories allow lock files on each node, lmwriter must have rw mkdir /opt/lifemapper/.java mkdir /opt/lifemapper/.java/.systemPrefs mkdir /opt/lifemapper/.java/.userPrefs /bin/chgrp lmwriter /opt/lifemapper/.java /bin/chmod g+ws /opt/lifemapper/.java
#!/bin/bash # do LM initializaton
/sbin/ldconfig /opt/lifemapper/rocks/bin/initLMcompute rm -rf /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-99-lifemapper
